chapter.title: Deploying the raw image
chapter.para: The following procedure lists steps to deploy a raw image to your system:

step.para: If needed, prepare the configuration medium as described in .
Prepare the raw image as described in .
Boot the machine with the configuration device plugged in. Alternatively, without using the configuration medium, proceed as described in .
After the first boot, you can register your &slema; instance by using the transactional-update command. For details, refer to .
&slema; has extensions available. To use some of these extensions, you need to add the extension to your subscription from the installed system. For details, refer to .

chapter.para: To deploy the raw image to your machine, proceed as follows:

Copy the decompressed image to the device where &slema; will run:
